WITH ranked_pm AS ( SELECT purc_order_no, progress_monitoring_date AS last_date, SUM(material_cnt) OVER(PARTITION BY purc_order_no) AS total_cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY purc_order_no ORDER BY progress_monitoring_date DESC) AS rn FROM progress_monitoring ), latest_pm AS ( SELECT purc_order_no, last_date, total_cnt FROM ranked_pm WHERE rn = 1 ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT po.purc_order_code , sup.sup_name , po.purc_order_reg_date , LEAST(DATE_ADD(pm.last_date, INTERVAL 7 DAY), mrp_due_date) AS next_progress_date , mrp.mrp_due_date , emp.emp_name , ROUND((IFNULL(pm.total_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate , ROUND( (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) AS expected_progress_rate , CASE WHEN ROUND((IFNULL(pm.total_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) >= ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) THEN 'R0' WHEN ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) - ROUND((IFNULL(pm.total_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) <= 15 THEN 'R1' WHEN ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) - ROUND((IFNULL(pm.total_cnt,0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) <= 24 THEN 'R2' ELSE 'R3' END AS progress_eval FROM purchase_order po JOIN contract ct ON po.cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN supplier sup ON ct.sup_no = sup.sup_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no JOIN employee emp ON po.emp_no = emp.emp_no
LEFT JOIN latest_pm pm ON pm.purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no ) AS base

SELECT po.purc_order_no , po.purc_order_code , DATE(po.purc_order_reg_date) AS po_date_only , emp.emp_no , emp.emp_name , sup.sup_name , sup.sup_reg_no , sup.sup_ceo_name , sup.sup_phone , CONCAT(sup.sup_addr1, sup.sup_addr2) AS sup_total_addr , sup.sup_cip , sup.sup_cip_phone , sup.sup_cip_email , ct.cont_material_cnt FROM purchase_order po JOIN employee emp ON po.emp_no = emp.emp_no JOIN contract ct ON po.cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN supplier sup ON ct.sup_no = sup.sup_no
WHERE po.purc_order_code = #{purc_order_code}

SELECT ma.material_no , po.purc_order_status , ma.material_name , ma.material_code , ct.cont_material_cnt , mrp.mrp_due_date , SUM(pm.material_cnt) AS total_material_cnt , ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) AS total_progress_rate , ROUND( (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) AS expected_progress_rate , ct.cont_material_cnt - IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt), 0) AS rest_progress_cnt , CASE WHEN ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) = 100 AND po.purc_order_status = 1 THEN 'done' WHEN ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) >= ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) THEN 'R0' WHEN ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) - ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) <= 15 THEN 'R1' WHEN ROUND((DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),po.purc_order_reg_date) * 1.0 / DATEDIFF(mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date)) * 100, 1) - ROUND((IFNULL(SUM(pm.material_cnt),0) * 1.0 / ct.cont_material_cnt) * 100, 1) <= 24 THEN 'R2' ELSE 'R3' END AS progress_eval
FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_no = ma.material_no JOIN contract ct ON po.cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no
WHERE po.purc_order_code = #{purc_order_code} GROUP BY ma.material_no, ma.material_code, ma.material_name, ct.cont_material_cnt, mrp.mrp_due_date, po.purc_order_reg_date, po.purc_order_status ORDER BY ma.material_code

SELECT pm.progress_monitoring_no , po.purc_order_no , ma.material_no , pm.progress_monitoring_ver , ma.material_name , ma.material_code , ct.cont_material_cnt , mrp.mrp_due_date , DATE(pm.progress_monitoring_date) AS pm_date_only , pm.material_cnt , pm.progress_monitoring_etc FROM progress_monitoring pm JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.purc_order_no = po.purc_order_no JOIN material ma ON pm.material_no = ma.material_no JOIN contract ct ON po.cont_no = ct.cont_no JOIN material_resource_plan mrp ON po.mrp_no = mrp.mrp_no
WHERE po.purc_order_code = #{purc_order_code} ORDER BY pm.progress_monitoring_ver ASC, ma.material_code ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM progress_monitoring WHERE DATE(progress_monitoring_date) = STR_TO_DATE(#{progress_monitoring_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
